page.title: 04CLACHAIG TODAY.
page.content: Clachaig is a small community of 18 houses.There are about 25 people living in Clachaig.The biggest family is 4 and they are a rare exception. Recently more young people are moving back into Clachaig.Now a days the cottages are owned privately by the people that live in them. The inhabitants of the village are mostly people over 40.The oldest people in the village are a Mrs Scott and a Mr Wright who are both 78.Mrs Scott has lived there the longest,she has lived there all 78 years of her life. There is 2 bus services through Clachaig one of which is the Dunoon Grammar School bus and the other one is the post office bus.
